channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet
channel.description: The latest local problems reported by users

item.title: Ugly concrete blocks, 11th August
item.description:
Why have you dumped these ugly concrete blocks in Crossway park? They serve no purpose and the one near the canal is blocking the path. It prevents cyclists and those on mobility scooters from passing

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Eastern Way, London
Report on FixMyStreet
